nodes.title: Merged upstream/master and did first version of readonly-tasks for producteev-teammember-tasks.
Added a field for tracking the last gtasks sync date of a particular task
Update strings-cs.po , still not for launch :)
updated crittercism to 1.01 with support for offline-crashes and fixing u
Using DialogUtilities to dismiss the dialog as Tim suggested.
Cleaned up the code a bit. Removed the error-emulation and moved the init
Potential fix for fb-77 as I cant reproduce this bug.
Added gcal-deletion setting in Manage Old Tasks-settingsmenu
Fixed crash in crittercism launch, use of Pair in ask adapter
Better gtasks error messages and human readable scope alias for auth toke
Login to astrid.com won't block the ui thread anymore
New list view like iOS version
Implemented gcal-default-setting and fixed some bugs with gcal-integratio
Fixed behavior of weekly repeating from completion
Option to hide not in any list when syncing with gtasks
List context menu item should rename tag data too
Specific time picker is always enabled on show
Fixed issue where empty lists wouldn't show up in the dropdown menu
Skip login screen, go to welcome graphic first
New user experience with login prompt and welcome graphic
Fixed a bug that caused task edit activity to quit on rotate
Sync prefs pages now show name or email of logged in user
Backported some changes made in the wimm project
Sync doesn't reset reminder settings anymore
Adjusted gtasks due date functions to work around Google's rounding
Test suite for repeating tasks--includes offline tests and tests for sync
Affinity of NotificationActivity is now main app
Implemented a few of Scott's small UI tweaks
Search tasks from home screen enabled
Completed tasks now stay in gtasks lists until cleared
Fixed a bug in the gtasks legacy migrator where lists could end up being
Potential fix for duplicated notes in producteev. Please test this!
Active lists are now based on last activity
Added MANAGE_ACCOUNTS permission and exception handling for 503 errors
Improved synchronization issues with sync on save
Potential fix for User cannot start Astrid due to force close
Fix for Snooze for x hours / isn't label but not default functionality
Gtasks sync on save + major bugfixes
Partial Fix for Filters not working on ZTE Blade (15723487) for ZTE Blade
Fix for 13186807 (Create option to override ringer volume)
Added delete completed/purged tasks to settings. Needs polishing (backgro
Fix for repeating task problems (15287199) and refreshments for the taskl
Google Tasks Api integration. Basic tests are passing, various edge cases
Added 'In two weeks' and 'next month' options to the deadline picker
User-set default reminders and fix for 24h dateformat in the tasklist and timepicker
ant converge working / API path fixed in build script
Fix for 13186759, note-ordering and pref-setting show all notes. couldnt
Make Google Tasks lists respect the "Display Completed" preference flag.
Pdv teamtask and some minor fixes
duplicate-fix for locally renaming tasks in Astrid, also fix for deleting workspaces remotely
updated readme for initial contributor workflow
Sync using self signed ssl certs
Add two option "When Arrive" and "When Leave" for location reminders.
Created two fields in the edit task screen, report and evaluation, and a report dialog window in the task list when the user completes the task.
Preliminary support for asking about adding a user to a list...
Aj taskswidget manual order and SQLMaid
new popover arrow... not sure if the angle works but maybe?
Corrected some german texts and added ignores for intellij
Fixed deleting a task not stopping the timer. Caveat: Timer-stop is not ...
tighened checkboxes using exact file from iOS for consistency
Date shows day character for chinese japanese and korean
fixed wrong size of refresh icon for tablets
In comments, make links to tasks.
Fixed sync timing issues with astrid.com
Change how due times are handled
Resolve sync conflicts by choosing side with more recently modified
Added code to catch SQLiteException errors like missing columns
replaced placeholders with search icons for dark and light themes
update icons for drop-downs including dark-themed icons
update menu buttons per Sam's request
Fixed task rabbit login with Tim
Removed gps permission for task rabbit
Fix sql crash when cloning tasks
Added new widget 9 patch and fixed timer activity not showing up
Fixed dissappearing comments in recent activity
Tag header is now in listview header, fixed width for updates
Fixes for lots of sync issues, hopefully resolving duplicates
unsetting c2dm on server when user or token doesn't match
Faster task edit loading, minor polish
Bug fixes to fragment lifecycles, especially when rotating
Rewrote copy for add new task
Updates and corrections (spelling, grammar) in Polish translation.
